review: I went here for some drinks and I can honestly say the bar-tender was great and knew how to make his cocktails. He was really experienced and knew his stuff. Started the night here and if in the area, I will come back.

Had a great meal there. Real filling burgers ! And very friendly staff who sang a bday song for me. A four as I went there previously and the chips was burnt and cold with me and my friends. Steak was ok too, Cheers
Takes an age to get to the toilet. Noway near as good as either of the Cardiff stores. I also find them very slow with your orders, and I once ended up sending back a cocktail 3 times!
